page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: Youlgrave is situated in the Peak District National Park. We have many visitors, especially in the summer. The Youth Hostel in Youlgrave can hold 44 people. Their busiest time of the year is welldressing week (at the end of June). People stay at the Youth Hostel to enjoy the countryside and the welldressings. There are 5 camp sites, 3 of which have static caravans. There are 18 static caravans at Hopping Farm: an overnight stay costs Â£3. The Caravan Club also has a site at Hopping Farm for touring caravans. Many walkers and cyclists pass through Youlgrave and stop at one of the two local cafes. A growing number of cottages are being bought as holiday homes. Many local people are not pleased with this. Louise Ede (11)
